steps.text: Evaluate machine's fire risk
Issue clear instructions regarding safety
Supervise compliance with issued instructions
Perform scheduled maintenance according to manufacturer's instructions
Use authentic replacement parts from known manufacturers
Check joints of hoses and pipes
Inspect electrical systems
Use a multimeter to measure voltage drops
Visually inspect electrical systems at least once a year
Document electrical system inspections
Service electrical systems daily on electric-powered and hybrid machines
Inspect electrical systems with a thermal imaging camera
Compare readings with an intact machine.
Ensure power is cut off when switch is used.
Find emergency kill switch location and operation.
Repair any malfunctions before using it again.
Check battery condition.
Repair any deviations.
Ensure cable terminals are intact and covered.
Provide sufficient ventilation for the battery compartment.
Ensure fuses and their boxes are intact.
Investigate causes of blown fuses.
Attach cables in high-vibration engine compartment.
Fasteners and cable ties should be installed.
Fasteners and cable ties should withstand temperatures of 120°C.
Do not attach cables to pipes or hoses containing flammable material.
Firmly attach alternator with correct belt tension and have terminal covers.
Keep alternator filter clean.
Check exhaust pipe for leaks and ensure all thermal shields are in place.
Inspect all hoses and electrical systems in swivelling joint weekly.
Remove any rocks or twigs from swivelling joint immediately.
Ensure all operating manuals are available in machine and understood by operator.
Check cleanliness and condition of auxiliary heater and its compartment before winter.
Inspect heater's exhaust pipe to ensure it doesn't touch anything flammable.
Test heater under supervision before use.
Install a fixed fire extinguishing system in autonomous machines
Protect hot components, flammable liquid hoses/tanks, and electrical components with the system
Ensure the system covers the entire engine compartment
Use at least 6 liters of agent per protected cubic meter in non-hazardous environments
Use at least 3 liters of agent per cubic meter in hazardous environments
Connect the detection system to non-fused cables
Confirm engine fire.
Activate fire extinguishing system.
Evacuate personnel from the area.
Call emergency services.
Remain calm.
Shut down the engine.
Move the machine outdoors (if indoors).
Cut electricity from the main power switch.
Call for help (use emergency number 112).
Report all accidents and dangerous situations to a supervisor immediately.
Stop and leave the machine in place if possible.
Prevent further damage and minimize injuries.
Wear protective clothing and a helmet.
Use a hands-free device for phone calls.
Perform first-aid fire extinguishing.
Use stepladders and handrails while climbing, maintaining three points of contact.
Keep doors closed during operation.
Repair any malfunctions that could lead to an accident without delay.

constraints.expression: Machine's operating environment should be considered when evaluating its fire risk.
constraints.text: Machine's operating environment should be considered when evaluating its fire risk.

constraints.expression: Clear instructions regarding safety must be issued before commencing work.
constraints.text: Clear instructions regarding safety must be issued before commencing work.

constraints.expression: Compliance with safety instructions must be supervised.
constraints.text: Compliance with safety instructions must be supervised.

constraints.expression: Machine functions properly after scheduled maintenance
constraints.text: Machine functions properly after scheduled maintenance

constraints.expression: Authentic replacement parts are used during maintenance
constraints.text: Authentic replacement parts are used during maintenance

constraints.expression: High-quality materials are used for maintenance
constraints.text: High-quality materials are used for maintenance

constraints.expression: The temperature of hydraulic hoses should not exceed 120°C.
constraints.text: The temperature of hydraulic hoses should not exceed 120°C.

constraints.expression: Perform visual electrical system inspections at least once a year.
constraints.text: Perform visual electrical system inspections at least once a year.

constraints.expression: Voltage drops exceeding 20W indicate an increased fire risk.
constraints.text: Voltage drops exceeding 20W indicate an increased fire risk.

constraints.expression: Use a thermal imaging camera for electrical system inspections.
constraints.text: Use a thermal imaging camera for electrical system inspections.

constraints.expression: Machine reading comparison is only valid with an intact machine.
constraints.text: Machine reading comparison is only valid with an intact machine.

constraints.expression: Main power switch must be located outside engine compartment and visibly marked.
constraints.text: Main power switch must be located outside engine compartment and visibly marked.

constraints.expression: Power must be cut off when main power switch is used.
constraints.text: Power must be cut off when main power switch is used.

constraints.expression: Know location and operation of emergency kill switch before starting machine.
constraints.text: Know location and operation of emergency kill switch before starting machine.

constraints.expression: Repair malfunctions before resuming operation after emergency kill switch usage.
constraints.text: Repair malfunctions before resuming operation after emergency kill switch usage.

constraints.expression: Battery repair required for any deviations.
constraints.text: Battery repair required for any deviations.

constraints.expression: Cable terminals must be intact and covered.
constraints.text: Cable terminals must be intact and covered.

constraints.expression: Sufficient ventilation for battery compartment.
constraints.text: Sufficient ventilation for battery compartment.

constraints.expression: Check cables not protected by a fuse (battery, alternator, starter motor) at least once a year.
constraints.text: Check cables not protected by a fuse (battery, alternator, starter motor) at least once a year.

constraints.expression: Check rubber collars on lead-through cables.
constraints.text: Check rubber collars on lead-through cables.

constraints.expression: Replace cables with signs of abrasion or heat damage.
constraints.text: Replace cables with signs of abrasion or heat damage.

constraints.expression: Protect cables with a housing pipe.
constraints.text: Protect cables with a housing pipe.

constraints.expression: Keep cables clean of oil and dirt.
constraints.text: Keep cables clean of oil and dirt.

constraints.expression: Do not attach cables to hoses or pipes.
constraints.text: Do not attach cables to hoses or pipes.

constraints.expression: Protect cable harnesses and attach firmly.
constraints.text: Protect cable harnesses and attach firmly.

constraints.expression: Ensure cable connections are tight and have terminal covers.
constraints.text: Ensure cable connections are tight and have terminal covers.

constraints.expression: Check electric panel during maintenance.
constraints.text: Check electric panel during maintenance.

constraints.expression: Repair any redundant or hanging wires in electric panel.
constraints.text: Repair any redundant or hanging wires in electric panel.

constraints.expression: Fuse boxes are intact and have lids.
constraints.text: Fuse boxes are intact and have lids.

constraints.expression: Cables in high-vibration engine compartment have fastening brackets no more than 150mm apart.
constraints.text: Cables in high-vibration engine compartment have fastening brackets no more than 150mm apart.

constraints.expression: Fasteners and cable ties can withstand temperatures of 120°C.
constraints.text: Fasteners and cable ties can withstand temperatures of 120°C.

constraints.expression: Do not attach cables to pipes or hoses containing flammable material.
constraints.text: Do not attach cables to pipes or hoses containing flammable material.

constraints.expression: The alternator is firmly attached with correct belt tension and has terminal covers.
constraints.text: The alternator is firmly attached with correct belt tension and has terminal covers.

constraints.expression: The alternator filter is kept clean.
constraints.text: The alternator filter is kept clean.

constraints.expression: No exhaust leaks are present.
constraints.text: No exhaust leaks are present.

constraints.expression: All thermal shields on the exhaust pipe are in place.
constraints.text: All thermal shields on the exhaust pipe are in place.

constraints.expression: Weekly inspection of hoses and electrical systems in swivelling joint
constraints.text: Weekly inspection of hoses and electrical systems in swivelling joint

constraints.expression: Immediate removal of rocks or twigs from swivelling joint
constraints.text: Immediate removal of rocks or twigs from swivelling joint

constraints.expression: Availability of operating manuals in language understood by operator
constraints.text: Availability of operating manuals in language understood by operator

constraints.expression: Cleanliness and condition check of auxiliary heater and its compartment before winter
constraints.text: Cleanliness and condition check of auxiliary heater and its compartment before winter

constraints.expression: Heater compartment must be clean and free of fuel leaks
constraints.text: Heater compartment must be clean and free of fuel leaks

constraints.expression: Exhaust pipe inspection to ensure it doesn't touch anything flammable
constraints.text: Exhaust pipe inspection to ensure it doesn't touch anything flammable

constraints.expression: Supervision during heater testing
constraints.text: Supervision during heater testing

constraints.expression: Autonomous machines in non-hazardous environments require a fixed fire extinguishing system with minimum 6 liters of agent per cubic meter (S1)
constraints.text: Autonomous machines in non-hazardous environments require a fixed fire extinguishing system with minimum 6 liters of agent per cubic meter (S1)

constraints.expression: Autonomous machines in hazardous environments require a fixed fire extinguishing system with minimum 3 liters of agent per cubic meter (S1)
constraints.text: Autonomous machines in hazardous environments require a fixed fire extinguishing system with minimum 3 liters of agent per cubic meter (S1)

constraints.expression: Detection system in autonomous machines must cover the entire engine compartment (S1, S5)
constraints.text: Detection system in autonomous machines must cover the entire engine compartment (S1, S5)

constraints.expression: Machines in hazardous environments require a fixed, fully automatic fire extinguishing system (S2)
constraints.text: Machines in hazardous environments require a fixed, fully automatic fire extinguishing system (S2)

constraints.expression: There must be at least 3 liters of extinguishing agent for each cubic meter of the engine or heater compartment in hazardous environments (S2)
constraints.text: There must be at least 3 liters of extinguishing agent for each cubic meter of the engine or heater compartment in hazardous environments (S2)

constraints.expression: Detection system in autonomous machines must be connected to non-fused cables (S3, S6)
constraints.text: Detection system in autonomous machines must be connected to non-fused cables (S3, S6)

constraints.expression: The system's operation must be confirmed during start-up.
constraints.text: The system's operation must be confirmed during start-up.

constraints.expression: Any malfunction MUST be repaired immediately.
constraints.text: Any malfunction MUST be repaired immediately.

constraints.expression: The system MUST be serviced at least once a year.
constraints.text: The system MUST be serviced at least once a year.

constraints.expression: Engine compartments MUST be cleaned daily.
constraints.text: Engine compartments MUST be cleaned daily.

constraints.expression: If indoors, move the machine outdoors before shutting down the engine.
constraints.text: If indoors, move the machine outdoors before shutting down the engine.

constraints.expression: Avoid moving the machine near flammable materials before shutting it down.
constraints.text: Avoid moving the machine near flammable materials before shutting it down.

constraints.expression: Confirm fire is completely out before leaving the area.
constraints.text: Confirm fire is completely out before leaving the area.

constraints.expression: Follow up with the fire department after initial fire control.
constraints.text: Follow up with the fire department after initial fire control.

constraints.expression: Report the incident to relevant parties.
constraints.text: Report the incident to relevant parties.

constraints.expression: Ensure protective clothing is worn during operation.
constraints.text: Ensure protective clothing is worn during operation.

constraints.expression: Maintain proper safety measures while climbing.
constraints.text: Maintain proper safety measures while climbing.

constraints.expression: Doors must be closed during equipment operation.
constraints.text: Doors must be closed during equipment operation.

constraints.expression: Malfunctioning parts should be repaired promptly.
constraints.text: Malfunctioning parts should be repaired promptly.
